description: ORDER in case 1:96-cv-05238-JG-JO; granting (2111) Motion for Settlement in case 1:05-md-01720-JG-JO. For the reasons given in the attached order, the Court certifies the Rule 23(b)(2) and (b)(3) classes for settlement purposes and approves the settlement, with one minor modification as described. The Court defers decision on, and will issue a separate order on, the 2113 matter of attorneys' fees and costs. A status conference will be held on January 10, 2014 at 3:00 PM to discuss next steps in the case in courtroom 6C South before Judge John Gleeson. Ordered by Judge John Gleeson on 12/13/2013. Associated Cases: 1:05-md-01720-JG-JO et al. (Aronoff, Peter) (Entered: 12/13/2013)
